title: Kashmir Great Lakes
subtitle: Alpine lake postcard trails
about: The Kashmir Great Lakes trail stitches together multiple crystal-blue alpine lakes across the Himalayan meadows—each day brings a new postcard view. Rolling meadows, quiet camps and reflective lake basins make it one of India’s most visual treks.
seo_title: Kashmir Great Lakes Trek — Alpine Lakes
seo_description: Multiple blue lakes and alpine meadows across Kashmir. A visual trek with serene camps and panoramic views.

trek_places.name: Aru Valley
trek_places.short: Green gateway village with alpine trails
trek_places.about: Aru is a verdant valley with meadows and traditional guesthouses, used as the entry point for numerous Kashmir treks. It provides strong local support and scenic warm-up walks.
what_to_do: Hire a local guide and check conditions
Start the main Great Lakes route early

trek_places.name: Tarsar Lake
trek_places.short: Mirror-like alpine lake in a wide basin
trek_places.about: Tarsar is a huge, glassy lake surrounded by ridgelines—its calm surface reflects the sky and mountains, making it an iconic campsite and photo subject.
what_to_do: Walk the shoreline and small ridgelines
